channel.title: Collaboration on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Collaboration on Laura Kalbag

item.title: And I accidentally became a control freak…
item.description: Following on from my post yesterday about working with Indie Phone for 50% of my time, my thought on the Pastry Box today is about how I accidentally became a control freak. It’s hard to admit the flaws you find in yourself, but I’m so determined to do a good job that I think it’s better to find those flaws and try to fix them!
